sections.summary:
I am currently looking to advance my career in a position that offers a greater challenge, and the opportunity to enhance the company's productivity
and reputation. With my educational background and the experience which I have gained in my previous position, I can effectively connect with
customers, sales team, and the professional services department.
sections.skills:

Strong interpersonal skills Data warehousing
Critical thinker Database management
